trans-unit.source: Configures the currency and exception rules for your app.

seg-source.mrk: Configures the currency and exception rules for your app.

target.mrk: 組態您應用程式的幣別和例外規則。

trans-unit.source: For the app currency, you can choose either the controlling area currency or the company code currency.

seg-source.mrk: For the app currency, you can choose either the controlling area currency or the company code currency.

target.mrk: 針對應用程式幣別，您可以選擇成本控制範圍幣別或公司代碼幣別。

trans-unit.source: The settings you make for exception rules influence the values shown in the <uicontrol>Exception Status</uicontrol> column in your result list. The column can show a status of green, yellow or red status. You can define the threshold and basic criteria for each status here.

seg-source.mrk: The settings you make for exception rules influence the values shown in the <uicontrol>Exception Status</uicontrol> column in your result list.
The column can show a status of green, yellow or red status.
You can define the threshold and basic criteria for each status here.

target.mrk: 您對例外規則所做的設定，將影響在結果清單 <uicontrol>[異常狀態]</uicontrol> 欄中顯示的值。
該欄將顯示綠色狀態，或是黃色、紅色狀態。
您可在此為各個狀態定義門檻和基本準則。

trans-unit.source: In the <uicontrol>Rule Basis</uicontrol> field, choose the criteria for the rule, and whether it is triggered by a percentage value, an absolute value, or both.

seg-source.mrk: In the <uicontrol>Rule Basis</uicontrol> field, choose the criteria for the rule, and whether it is triggered by a percentage value, an absolute value, or both.

target.mrk: 在 <uicontrol>[規則基礎]</uicontrol> 欄位中，選擇規則準則，以及是否由百分比值、絕對值驅動，亦或兩者皆可。

trans-unit.source: Define the absolute or percentage thresholds for your rule and save your settings.

seg-source.mrk: Define the absolute or percentage thresholds for your rule and save your settings.

target.mrk: 為您的規則定義絕對或百分比門檻，並儲存設定。
